scripts.stage:markup: cp src/index.html dist && cp src/wedding.html dist
scripts.stage: npm run stage:assets && npm run stage:markup
scripts.compile:styles: lessc src/styles.less dist/styles.css && lessc --js src/wedding.less dist/wedding.css
scripts.compile: npm run compile:scripts && npm run compile:styles
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run stage && npm run compile
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:local
